body.value:
The meeting will be held at Embassy Suites Denver Downtown and will provide opportunities for learning, networking, and enhancing your skills in multi-site palliative care research. This is an annual event you won’t want to miss!

The meeting will take place Thursday, February 28th from 1 – 5:30pm mountain time and Friday, March 1st from 8am – 1:30 pm mountain time.

While our funding mechanism does not support the provision of food or beverages, the hotel offers a free breakfast service and happy hour for all registered guests. There is also a wide range of dining options available in the surrounding area. You are welcome to bring your own food into the meeting space. We will be encouraging all meeting participants to create lunch and dinner plans as a way to network and collaborate with other meeting attendees.

All members are invited to take part in our updated New Member Orientation Session starting at 12pm MT on 2/28 and all of the general Investigator sessions starting at 1pm on Thursday and ending Friday at 1:30pm MT.

The meeting agenda will be distributed to all PCRC members in the coming weeks.

LOCATION:
Embassy Suites Denver Downtown
1420 Stout Street
Denver, CO 80202
PCRC Rate: $174 / night + taxes and fees
Unless otherwise informed, you will be responsible for all hotel and travel expenses.
 
START TIME:
Thursday, February 28th, 2019 @ 1:00 pm mountain time
All members are invited to attend a New Member Orientation Session from 12 - 1:00 pm mountain time.
 
END TIME:
Friday, March 1st, 2019 @ 1:30 pm mountain time
(3pm end time for Steering Committee Members)

[button color="orange" size="large" url="mailto:carrie.brill@ucdenver.edu?subject=F2F%202019%20RSVP"]RSVP Now![/button]

Please note that unless otherwise informed, funding for travel expenses, including hotel stay, is not available to attendees. Please feel free to contact Carrie with any questions at carrie.brill@ucdenver.edu.
